mapper.select: SELECT u.name, u.password, u.email, p.permission FROM public."user" as u LEFT JOIN public."permission" as p ON u.email = p.user_email WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public."user" (name, password, email) VALUES (#{name}, #{password}, #{email})
INSERT INTO public."permission" (user_name, user_email, permission) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{permission})
